attributes.action: Call for a national referendum on the introduction of Digital ID.
attributes.additional_details: As this was never mooted in thus government's election manifesto, I would suggest that draconian changes to our civil liberties, such as the one proposed, should be a matter for national referenda now and in the future.
attributes.background: I think the introduction of digital ID is a suitable subject for a national vote especially following the vast number of signatures on a recent petition against the government's plans.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Hold a referendum on introducing mandatory identity cards in the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734246
